article.headline: Rowbury's 19 lead SE Louisiana past New Orleans 73-68
article.description: — Brody Rowbury's 19 points helped SE Louisiana defeat New Orleans 73-68 on Saturday night.
article.linkText: Rowbury's 19 lead SE Louisiana past New Orleans 73-68
article.story: NEW ORLEANS -- — Brody Rowbury's 19 points helped SE Louisiana defeat New Orleans 73-68 on Saturday night. Rowbury also contributed six rebounds for the Lions (6-8, 1-0 Southland Conference). Roger McFarlane added 16 points while going 5 of 14 from the floor, including 2 for 4 from 3-point range, and 4 for 7 from the line, and they also had 10 rebounds. Roscoe Eastmond finished 5 of 5 from the field to finish with 12 points. The Privateers (5-9, 0-1) were led in scoring by Khaleb Wilson-Rouse, who finished with 17 points. Jordan Johnson added 16 points, six assists and three steals for New Orleans. Jamond Vincent also recorded 13 points. Both teams next play Monday. SE Louisiana visits Nicholls State and New Orleans plays Texas A&M-Commerce at home. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.

statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
